mapper.select: select u.id,u.username,u.avatar_url from tb_team t left join tb_user_team ut on t.id = ut.team_id left join tb_user u on ut.user_id = u.id where t.id = #{teamUserListId} and t.is_delete = 0 and ut.is_delete = 0 and u.is_delete = 0;
select t.id,t.team_name,t.avatar_url,t.expire_time,t.leader_id from tb_team t left join tb_user_team ut on t.id = ut.team_id WHERE ut.user_id = #{userId} and t.is_delete = 0 and ut.is_delete = 0;

select id from tb_team as t where max_num >= 2 AND max_num > (select count(team_id) FROM tb_user_team where team_id = t.id) and `status` != 1 and (ISNULL(expire_time) or expire_time > SYSDATE()) and is_delete = 0 and not EXISTS (select team_id from tb_user_team as tu where user_id = #{userId} and is_delete = 0 and t.id = tu.team_id);
